member.name: T:gLabel.gLabel
member.summary: Label control with built-in effects like AutoFit, MouseOver, Shadow, Outer Glow, and Pulse Glow

member.name: M:gLabel.gLabel.EnabledColor(System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Convert color to gray if Disabled else return origional color

member.name: M:gLabel.gLabel.EnableBlends(System.Drawing.Color[])
member.summary: Convert colorblend to grayscale if Disabled else return origional colorblend

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.MouseOver
member.summary: Get or Set if the gLabel will Glow when the mouse is over it

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.MouseOverColor
member.summary: Get or Set what color the gLabel will Glow when the mouse is over it

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.FeatherState
member.summary: Get or Set if the text is glowing

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.Feather
member.summary: Get or Set the level of feathering (blurring) of the Outer Glow

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.Pulse
member.summary: Get or Set if the gLabel should be Pulsing or not

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.PulseSpeed
member.summary: Get or Set how fast to pulse the gLabel

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.ShadowOffset
member.summary: Get or Set how far to offset the shadow from the text

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.ShadowState
member.summary: Get or Set if the gLabel displays the shadow text

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.ShadowColor
member.summary: Get or Set what color to use for the shadow text

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.GlowState
member.summary: Get or Set if the text is glowing

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.Glow
member.summary: Get or Set how far out the text glows

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.GlowColor
member.summary: Get or Set what color to use for the Glow

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.Border
member.summary: Get or Set to show or not show the border

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.BorderColor
member.summary: Get or Set what Color to draw the border

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.BorderWidth
member.summary: Get or Set what Width to draw the border

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.AutoFit
member.summary: Get or Set if the text is fitted to the DisplayRectangle or uses Font Size

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.FillType
member.summary: The eFillType Fill Type to apply to the CButton

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.FillTypeLinear
member.summary: The Linear Blend type

member.name: P:gLabel.gLabel.ForeColorBlend
member.summary: The ColorBlend used to fill the CButton
